features: 【Provides All-day Comfort】Our wireless keyboard and mouse combo is designed with a foldable kickstand and a non-slip, non-sweat textured wrist rest to reduce the pressure on your wrist and increase comfort. It is also comfortable and easy to type as each key is quick to respond and tactile.

【Bring More Convenience】 Our computer keyboard has a universal phone holder built in, providing an extra place to put your phone, iPad or other gadgets without cluttering up your desk. This wireless keyboard and mouse is very convenient and allows you to easily check your text messages or other things on your phone without having to pick it up.

【Make Work More Efficient】The 10 individual multimedia keys on the keyboard allow you to access search, calculator, player, volume, etc. with one click. 6-button mouse with 3 DPI (800/1200/1600) and forward/backward functions will help you navigate the web faster and easier than ever before.

【Stable & Lag-free Connection】Thanks to the advanced and powerful 2.4G wireless connection with 10m/33ft signal range, our wireless keyboard and mouse combo is super stable connection without any lag or dropout. ** Please note that the wireless keyboard and mouse share a receiver, which is stored at the bottom of the mouse.**

【Powerful Compatibility】Supporting plug and play, this cordless keyboard and mouse combo is widely compatible with Windows XP/VISTA/7/8/10, Mac (Pplease note that the combination multimedia keys are not available in Mac system).

【Power Saving and Durability】 Both keyboard and mouse have a power switch, you can turn them off to save power when you are not using them, and they can also automatically turn to sleep mode if they are not operated for 5 minutes. The keyboard has an 18-month battery life and the mouse has a 24-month battery life, saving you the trouble of changing batteries frequently.
【Package Includes】1 x Keyboard / 1 x Mouse / 1 x USB Receiver (Stored in the battery compartment) / 1 x User Manual

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Designed for longer battery life 1. If the keyboard and mouse are not operated for more than 8 minutes, they will automatically go into sleep mode. Press any key to activate them. 2. The mouse and keyboard have separate switches that can be turned on/off if you are not using them for a while. 3. The LEDs on the keyboard will flash to remind you when to replace the low battery.

Phone Holder Our computer keyboard provides an extra place to put your phone, iPad or other gadgets without cluttering up your desk. It is very convenient and allows you to easily check your phone for incoming text messages or other things without having to pick it up. 10 Independent Shortcuts Besides 10 independent shortcuts, our PC keyboard is also equipped with 12 combined shortcuts which can make you quick assess to player, volume, homepage, email, computer, favorites, songs control, mute, etc. Comfortable &Precise Typing Every key of the ergonomic keyboard is fast responsive and tactile, which is also comfortable and easy to type, giving you come a good experience of use.

Bright Indicator Light There are 3 LED lights which can help you check whether your Num/Caps locks are enabled or not, and when its battery is running low, the battery indicator will flash to remind you of replacing battery in time. Make Work More Efficient The 6-button mouse with 3 DPI (800/1200/1600) and forward/backward functions will help you navigate web pages more quickly and easily than before. Full-size Keyboard Our computer keyboard comes with number pad. It is a standard full-size keyboard designed for highly efficient working.

Power-saving and Long-lasting Both keyboard and mouse have a power switch, so you can turn them off when you don’t use them for power saving, and they can also turn to sleep mode automatically if they’re not operated in 8min. Ergonomic Design Our wireless keyboard is designed with a foldable kickstand and a non-slip and sweat-resistant textured wrist rest that takes the pressure off your wrist. The mouse is also ergonomically designed to give you a comfortable experience. Waterproof & Dustproof The wireless keyboard is spill-proof, so if you accidentally spill a drink on it, you just need to wipe it up. And it plugs into an advanced double-sided circuit board, which has more stable performance and longer life.

The keyboard/mouse response is delayed and not working properly, how can I fix it? 1. The battery power may be insufficient, please replace the keyboard/mouse battery. 2. It may be caused by a computer jam, please restart the computer and try again. 3. The maximum usage distance of this product is 33 feet, please keep it within 33 feet. and make sure there are no metal obstructions between the keyboard/mouse and the receiver. 4. It is possible that the connection is exceptional and the solution is as follows: Keyboard: Remove the battery from the keyboard and the receiver from the computer.Reinsert the battery into the keyboard and the receiver into the computer jack.At a distance of 20 cm from the receiver, press the ESC+Q keys on the keyboard for 3~5 seconds to match the code. Mouse: Remove the battery from the mouse and the receiver from the computer.Reinsert the battery into the mouse and the receiver into the computer jack.At a distance of 20 cm from the receiver, press the right mouse button and the scroll wheel button simultaneously for 3 to 5 seconds to match the code. After successful pairing, it can be used normally. Note: If the above solution doesn’t help, repeat the procedures to pair again. If it still fail, please contact our service team to work for you.

New release 2.4G/Bluetooth Keyboard with Full Size card slot New Release 2.4G/Bluetooth Mechanical Keyboard LED Light New Release 2.4G Ergonomic Keyboard Mouse Combo Connectivity Technology 2.4G Wireless & Bluetooth mode 2.4G Wireless & Bluetooth mode USB-A/C Compatible Devices Laptop,iPad,Phone,PC,Mac Laptop,iPad,Phone,PC,Mac Laptop,Computer,Tablet Special Feature Full Size card slot (bracket) design Full Size Mechanical with red switches Full Size Wrist Rest RGB Backlit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, sleek look
reviews.reviewText: I love this wireless keyboard and mouse set. It looks nice and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this keyboard, it's super quiet and doesn't make any clicking sounds when you type or use the mouse. It's also super light so it's very portable. I haven't used it a lot in one sitting, so I'm not sure about the battery life, but the quality is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth keys and nice layout adn size
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard is right size, and rightly spaced keys. The mouse is ergonomic and fits the palm nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap keyboard, Overall a good deal.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this combo to use with my multimedia computer in my living room. It does a great job overall, and I'd recommend purchasing to anyone who needs a barebone keyboard that is more reliable than bluetooth. With that short review out of the way, let's get into my longer analysis. I promise it won't be too long.First, the good:The mouse is quiet! I didn't see that on the listing when I first looked at the product (though it does mention it plainly, so that's on me.) The scroll wheel feels normal (which is a good thing - many cheap mice squeak or feel way too loose), and the variable DPI settings are amazing on a mouse at this price point.The keyboard is relatively quiet as well, with a few exceptions that will come in the next section. Both devices are more reliable than the bluetooth set that I replaced with this purchase.Next, the not-so-good. To be fair, these are nitpicks, and aren't deal breakers at all.The keyboard feels cheap. The keys, while responsive, have a less-than-premium feel when you actuate them. My spacebar and 0 key on the number pad are also much louder than the rest of the keys, and have a small squeaking sound to them. There are plenty of shortcuts on this keyboard - I like the search, refresh, and calculator buttons the best by far. The multimedia controls are missing a dedicated mute button, but they are also very nice to have - however, the function keys have some duplicate shortcuts that make me scratch my head in confusion. Specifically, the f2, f3, f5-f8, and f11 keys are duplicates and essentially wasted, unless you really need 2 different ways to press the play button on Despacito.They call the keyboard and mouse ergonomic - and the mouse is - but I hesitate to agree when it comes to the keyboard. It does have a wrist rest, made of hard plastic, but it's not the most comfortable to use.Overall a great product, and I hope this helps you decide whether to get it or not!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought it last month the mouse is already failing, see update
reviews.reviewText: Bought it last month the mouse is already failing it must have a bad connection internally have to bang it to get it to work. Probably have to buy another soon trouble is I will have to buy a keyboard and mouse as they use the same dongle.Naturally it's past the return date. Update, after writing this review the manufacturer contacted me and offered to make good on the product which I took advantage of. They went beyond what they were responsible for and I thank them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Mouse is unusable
reviews.reviewText: The mouse is completely unusable, skips all over the place and as unprecise as can be. The keyboard is alright, but the keys need a lot of force to push down, makes typing more difficult than it needs to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Practical for small desks!
reviews.reviewText: I love that this keyboard has a slot to place your phone which I use often when I am working and don't want to place my phone on the charger. This lets me see any incoming calls or messages when I am working. The keyboard fits well with smaller desks and won't take up too much desk space as you see in the picture. I have a small desk and still have room left over for other items. Some drawbacks that I must mention which is the reason it lost 2 stars. The first is that I had to change the battery almost a month after receiving it. This could be because I use cheap batteries, but I have used other keyboards such as Logitech and the battery will last more than a month. A good way to get around this would probably be to just turn of the keyboard and mouse when not in use, but I always forget to do this. So far after having the product for about 2 months, i have changed the battery twice. The other draw back is that it that the keyboard and mouse turn off after like 2-3 minutes of inactivity which makes it a little frustrating but with time i have come to get used to taping on the keyboard or mouse before using it to reactivate them. For this reason I would not recommend this item for gaming use as you will be very frustrated. For work from home it is perfect once you get used to the constant turning off. However this is not the reason why it lost the second star. The reason is because the keyboard recently started glitching when playing Minecraft where the character would suddenly start jumping on its own or would walk a different direction. To fix this issue I just unplugged the dongle from the computer and reinserted it. However there should be no need for this and that is why this review is a 3 star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Literally the easiest thing to set up.
Keyboard works great, not bad at all. Phone holder works pretty well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2023

reviews.reviewText: This mouse and keyboard is very comfortable and quiet to use. I am so glad I purchased this.
Good keyboard,my K key keeps sticking but not a big deal, wish the mouse was a little more made for left-handed people but not very many are , I do like the phone holder
Great product for the price.Mouse is comfortable, quiet, and adaptive.Keyboard has enough functional extra keys to make it more than a basic model, but also no nonsense.
